org.cpsolver.studentsct.online.expectations

Interface OverExpectedCriterion

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvoidUnbalancedWhenNoExpectations, FractionallyOverExpected, FractionallyUnbalancedWhenNoExpectations, MinimizeConflicts, MoreSpaceThanExpected, NeverOverExpected, PenaltyNotNegative, PercentageOverExpected

    public interface OverExpectedCriterion
    Over-expected criterion interface. Various implementations can be provided.
    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Integer getExpected(int sectionLimit, double expectedSpace)
      Expected space, for printing purposes
      double getOverExpected(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment, Section section, Request request)

    • Method Detail

      • getOverExpected

        double getOverExpected(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                       Section section,
                       Request request)
        Expectation penalty, to be minimized
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        section - section in question
        request - student course request
        Returns:
        expectation penalty (typically 1.0 / number of subparts when over-expected, 0.0 otherwise)

      • getExpected

        Integer getExpected(int sectionLimit,
                    double expectedSpace)
        Expected space, for printing purposes
        Parameters:
        sectionLimit - section limit, see Section.getLimit()
        expectedSpace - expectation, see Section.getSpaceExpected()
        Returns:
        expected space to be printed (null if there are no expectations)
